alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Yakutat (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 22 at 2:58PM AKST until February 25 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW LIKELY BEGINNING THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY... .A strengthening low will move into the gulf Thursday with an associated front moving over the panhandle Friday morning. Precipitation will begin in the Yakutat area before extending from north to south across the panhandle. Some uncertainty exists regarding snow totals and, particularly in the south, the transition from snow to rain. ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 13 to 17 inches possible. * WHERE...City and Borough of Yakutat. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Greatest snowfall expected Friday morning, and a mix with rain Friday afternoon. Wintry mix will switch back to snow Friday night.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
